MapsforgeEmbeddedPlugin.initialize: fn(args: [?], success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeEmbeddedPlugin.setCenter: fn(lat: number, lng: number, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeEmbeddedPlugin.setZoom: fn(zoomLevel: number, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeEmbeddedPlugin.setMaxZoom: fn(maxZoom: number, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeEmbeddedPlugin.setMinZoom: fn(minZoom: number, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeEmbeddedPlugin.setOfflineTileLayer: fn(args: [?], success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeEmbeddedPlugin.setOnlineTileLayer: fn(args: [?], success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeEmbeddedPlugin.addMarker: fn(arg: [?], success?: fn(key: number), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeEmbeddedPlugin.addPolyline: fn(arg: [?], success?: fn(key: number), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeEmbeddedPlugin.deleteLayer: fn(key: number, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))

MapsforgeCachePlugin.initialize: fn(mapFilePath: string, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeCachePlugin.getTile: fn(args: [?], success?: fn(tilePath: string), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeCachePlugin.setCacheEnabled: fn(enabled: bool, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeCachePlugin.setExternalCache: fn(external: bool, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeCachePlugin.setMapFile: fn(absolutePath: string, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeCachePlugin.setMaxCacheAge: fn(milliseconds: number, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeCachePlugin.setMaxCacheSize: fn(sizeInMB: number, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeCachePlugin.setCacheCleaningTrigger: fn(sizeInMB: number, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
MapsforgeCachePlugin.destroyCacheOnExit: fn(destroy: bool, success?: fn(), error?: fn(message: string))
